sourcesContent:
Companies

  • {{company.id}} - {{company.name}}
import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {Company} from "./Models"; import {CompaniesService} from "./companies.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit{ title = 'hh-front'; companies: Company[] = []; constructor(private companiesService: CompaniesService) { } ngOnInit(){ this.companiesService.getCompanies().subscribe((data: Company[])=>{ this.companies = data; }) } getCompanies() { this.companiesService.getCompanies().subscribe((companies) => { this.companies = companies; }); } }
